entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35905.286 #77453

Updated

  • VB SymbolDisplay.ToDisplayString doesn't use `Optional` keyword when `IncludeDefaultValue` and not `IncludeOptionalBrackets` #77458
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.SymbolDisplay.ToDisplayString() returns "this[]" for C# indexer #14684
    Backlog
  • Suppress No Longer Showing in Error List #74228
    Backlog
  • `for` loop with multiple uninitialized variables no longer compiles #77160
    17.13
  • IDE0058 Not Generated for Expression Bodied Methods #76282
  • .NET Framework: "IDE0059: Remove unnecessary value assignment" is incorrectly shown when assigning value in an is operator and variable is used in a nameof. #76113
  • Unable to outdent #region (and other preprocessor directives) #37575
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use original names for extension implementation methods #77455
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Include the contents of System.Composition in Setup.Dependencies #77451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add null-conditional-assignment tests. #77450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update null-conditional-assignment branch from main #77449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
